Text:
If you are experiencing problems navigating the individual episode chapters, running this .mkv thru the mkvmerge app will fix:

http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/

Windows download link:  http://www.bunkus.org/videotools/mkvtoolnix/downloads.html#windows

Using above app, run mkvmerge GUI then select 'add' button open this .mkv then select 'Start muxing' button.  Re-muxed .mkv should now be able to navigate chapters!

Thanks!

Appreciate the upload. Kind of a hassle having them all bunched together though.
For the undisputed order in which they were aired (not that it matters since it's not a soap opera) is...
http://www.tvguide.com/tvshows/the-universe/episodes/288034
